item.Name: Don't scale damage#typically, we scale the damage to make only "lethal" collision damage kill people; this flag overrides that behavior
Object may choose not to deal damage#in some cases (notably, the thruster pack) we should ask an object if it wants to opt out of dealing damage for one reason or another

_field_real.name: minimum velocity for lethal collision#If your velocity is above this value the collision is potentially lethal, 0 retains old functionality where the lethality is decided by the damage modifier

plugin._field_explanation: 0 - means take default value from globals.globals

_field_real.name: minimum velocity for game damage#if you are going below this velocity we stop all game damage
Apply collision damage scale#0 means 1. 1 is standard scale. Some things may want to apply more damage
Friendly apply collision damage scale#0 means 1. 1 is standard scale. Some things may want to apply more damage, yet go soft on their friends

plugin._field_explanation: 0 - means take default value from globals.globals

_field_real.name: minimum velocity for absolute damage#if you are going below this velocity we stop all absolute damage
Apply absolute collision damage scale#0 means 1. 1 is standard scale. Some things may want to apply more damage
Friendly apply absolute collision damage scale#0 means 1. 1 is standard scale. Some things may want to apply more damage, yet go soft on their friends

plugin._field_explanation: Overrides the damage effect from globals.globals
